channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Buttons Shortcode and Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Buttons Shortcode and Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-0711|2024-03-18T19:05:51.650Z -- Unknown -- Buttons Shortcode and Widget
item.description: The Buttons Shortcode and Widget WordPress plugin through 1.16 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
